column2: After you resolve a horror check gain 1 Clue.
Action: Another investigator within range may perform 1 action. Activate only once per round.
Action: Another investigator within range becomes focus. Activate this ability only once per round.
One per round you or another investigator within range may reroll 1 die while resolving a test.
Once per round when you gain an item you may flip one horror facedown or discard one facedown horror.
You may move 1 additional space as part of a move action.
You cannot become stunned or restrained.
Whenever a monster is defeated gain one clue.
